issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Allow ParquetExec to parallelize work based on row groups
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11056](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11056). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ParquetExec currently parallelizes work by passinging individual files to threads. It would be nice to be able to do this in a finer-grained way by assigning row groups and/or column chunks instead. This will be especially important in distributed systems built on DataFusion.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11056?focusedCommentId=17332332) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/137
